website_summaries.verdict: A top-of-the-line tackle bag with all the bells and whistles you could dream of.
pros: Integrated LED light system for fishing at night
cons: This is an expensive bag, so it may not be the best investment if you only go fishing occasionally

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fishing Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Pricey? Yes. Worth it. YES. So while there are plenty of fishing backpacks out there that are less money the Wild River is by far the best. The layout and storage for the backpack is amazing. You will have no problem fitting all you need for a fishing trip. Very well thought out with the layout, clips, etc. I have worn the backpack while fishing from the bank and it is very comfortable. The padded straps and front strap make wearing it for longer periods of time no issue. Durability seems like it will be fine. I have not had it very long but the material seems thick and high quality. Absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M

customer_reviews.title: Backpack holds a lot of gear, get some extra slide ins for different types of fishing
customer_reviews.text: If you want a backpack for fishing tackle this is great. I found myself not needing backpack as much as I thought but it does work great when you're carrying a lot of stuff out to car or boat or back to your fishing hole. I like it and glad i bought it the light that can flip out or shine inside is great idea. A lot of cool features with this backpack. Comfortable to wear for sure.
customer_reviews.author: jeff cergnul

customer_reviews.title: Great concept cheaply made and they more than doubled the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great concept cheaply made and they more than doubled the price from the time I purchased it. It came with broken zipper and the flashlight didn't work properly, the bins were also cheap and not worth using.
customer_reviews.author: frog 36

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, trust a man
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely in love with this product. I just got mine today and almost made an unboxing video I was so pleased. The small details is really what got me, the storage capacity fits all my needs and everything has a place, the overall durability of this product is through the roof. I recently bought a “brand name” bag from a very well known retailer. I spent double for the bag and in my opinion got half the satisfaction. This bag is perfect and I’m buying everyone of my family members this exact bag.
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at first - watch the straps carefully!
customer_reviews.text: I️ absolutely love this tackle pack. It’s hard to see it fall apart like it has been lately (less than one year). I️ always get compliments on it by various anglers but I have to point out the straps withering away. I redact my previous 5 star rating because of this. I hope Wild River has a good replacement program.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son for Christmas. He’s only used it for 3 months and the light has stopped working and one of the side pockets has threading already unstitching. Very disappointed for the price I paid, I’d had hoped it would have held up better. This bag won’t even last the season. No response from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: Great product! We bought this for our 17yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Great product! We bought this for our 17yr old son who lives and breathes fishing. He has MANY lures etc and needed a good tackle box. This was perfect for him! He has all of his things neatly organized in it and he loves it! It has plenty of room and storage space for all of your fishing needs. And goes conveniently on your back. Would definetly buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The last tackle bag you'll ever need!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tackle bag! I originally was using the KastKing tackle backpack but it filled up pretty quickly. This bag holds everything that was in the KastKing bag plus 75% more! Light is very handy and the bag seems to be of high quality. I was a little discouraged by the price but pulled the trigger and don't regret it at all!!
customer_reviews.author: James Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing bag 5 stars my only disappointment bought for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fishing bag 5 stars my only disappointment bought for 130 dollars and some change month and half later it's for 85 dollars I wish I waited
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: I liked it
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it. It was bigger than expected. As big as a large back pack. It did come w batteries for the light, 4 plastic containers, the sheath for pliers, and a d ring. It’s ready to go and this week I will be putting it on a boat to fish from. Will update if things get better or worse.
customer_reviews.author: J-Ro

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, bad light.
customer_reviews.text: Have had the bag for a couple of months now. Seems well made, holds up decently. Lots of organization possible and holds more than I really need to carry. The built in light would've been nice except it drained my first set of batteries (Duracell) extremely quickly and blew up a set of Energizer batteries I tried after. Light is now unusable because I won't risk a fire behind my head...
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality, well thought out
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack tackle box. Now I ask myself why didn’t I buy this sooner. It’s common sense after you use it. It is much easier carrying the weight of your tackle on your back than in your hand and it leaves your hands free for poles, a bucket, seat, cooler or whatever you want. Also easier walking or hiking to your destination and climbing in a boat. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pack!
customer_reviews.text: I love the backpack itself. The one thing that I do not like is the storage containers that come with it. The containers need to be more adjustable. The slots are too small. I had to alter the dividers to allow some of my bigger lures to fit. The containers will not hold larger top water baits especially buzz baits without being altered. The fit of the backpack is great, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny De

customer_reviews.title: This bag is sweet
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sweet. Used to keep everything in one bag for my offshore tuna trips and had to dig through to find things. Put everything from hooks, jigs,trolling lures,weights, and plastics plus all the extra junk you bring. All fit with room to spare. This is going to be very easy to walk down the ramp with it on your back while carrying your rods and boots. Well built, and thought the light was a corny idea but it actually works pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: raidergart

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for fresh water or for those who are not pack rats.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for fresh water. I bought for salt water and had things that just wouldnt fit. The bins were not what i was lookong for but still a good bag for someone who just needed a fresh water on the go bag. Light is a great idea. Wish i could have used it.
customer_reviews.author: The Butcher

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful !  Pass it down to the kids !
customer_reviews.text: Verified Purchase Built like a tank ! Storage for everything even a light ! This is all you will need for a fishing backpack ! I was not expecting this quality ! Thank you for a well thought out product ! Worth every penny ! The only thing it does not do is drive me to the lake ! Humm jury still out on the zippers. the only upgrade I could find would be to use YKK zippers . 👌
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is junk. Two of the zippers broke within one week. The edges have also started to fray. This is a cheaply made product.
customer_reviews.author: Madmatthew13

customer_reviews.title: QC is Absent
customer_reviews.text: Poor sewing job. Pockets are sewn incorrectly or crooked. I'm quite confident that I was sold a defective unit that they couldn't or wouldn't sell in a store where you could physically see before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: easy on the back, the light at night is great and the work bench is nice to hold things.
customer_reviews.text: the light is bright to allow you work on stuff for night fishing. the straps are easy on the shoulders and hold the bag in a comfortable position for the hike to the fishing spot. there is plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room and well thought out design! My buddies were so envious of my Wild River product, I thought it was going to disappear on this weekend's fishing trip. Lots of room for fishing and personal supplies. The light is easy to operate and comes in very handy when you just need that little bit of light in the charter boat's bunk areas at night.
customer_reviews.author: Exnavydiver

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It's the perfect co-angler bag with room for the things you need. If you're the kind of angler that likes to over-pack then you may not like it but for me fishing BFL tournaments as a couple angler it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My Husband loved it! He has went thru many fishing bags but this is the best one so far ! It's Good quality and item as described! Fits everything and more and not to heavy. We fish alot and perfect for rivers lakes and ponds.
customer_reviews.author: Holli Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate bag for fishing. Quality is amazing. Storage amazing. Look amazing. Lighting capability amazing. Potential for additional storage amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT!!!!!! Holds all my gear needed! The light is super bright. This is a very durable bag, this has been carried on a long hiking/fishing trip, thrown on boats, kayaks, in cars. Ill post a picture later!
customer_reviews.author: OAK667

customer_reviews.title: Great fishing tackle backpack
customer_reviews.text: I am going to use this backpack for fishing. I really like it. But could use one more large pocket. But I saw the video and it is everything I expected. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great light idea
customer_reviews.text: Great bag to carry all your fishing gear. Can get heavy, but you're not wearing it on your back the entire time. Love the light to help during the dark hours
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it is a great backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and holds a lot of tackle with organization. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 is because i would really want a drink holder on the side for when I'm walking the banks for a long time. Other than that it is a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome backpack
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome backpack. I don't have a whole lot bad to say about it except that the price is maybe a little high compared to its competitors. But this thing holds a pretty good amount of fishing tackle. The flashlight in the middle compartment on the back is pretty useful at night. I also like the compartment for sunglasses on the top even though I don't use it to put my sunglasses in.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mead

customer_reviews.title: best investment i've ever made
customer_reviews.text: best investment i've ever made, and it come with a rain bag to cover your backpack so your tackles dont get soak due to heavy over sprayed or rain. although i wished it had came with a rod holder for even more convenience. over all would recommend getting one if you plan on doing some salt water fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse James 1871

customer_reviews.title: WOW, just AWESOME! Thought of almost everything.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME! Lots of small compartments, love the LED light that lights up inside the bag, or outside the bag. Had trouble with some of my larger lures, and if it had a place I could strap on my pole it would be a full fish assault bag in my opinion. (I'm sure there is someway to strap a pole on, I just haven't figured it out yet.)
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth every penny. Game-changer allowing unmatched mobility. Reaching bodies of water off the beaten path is now a breeze. Much better than lugging around a large plastic tackle box all day. High quality construction throughout. Don’t hesitate on this one. Will be one of the most satisfying fishing gear purchases you’ll ever make.
customer_reviews.author: CardsFan79

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Plastic containers and strong. The light is a great idea. I’m using it as a tool bag and is proven to be handy
customer_reviews.author: Joelle A Carbonel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tackle bag! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This tackle is everything and more!! I bought it for my husband for Father’s Day. He is in love! Just enough room to take everything you need! With also a little table to hold weights or hooks so you can reset your line if needed!
customer_reviews.author: soncrae

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping gear organized. I wish it had a fishing pole holder. The built in LED light has stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Quite annoying.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the LED light battery container was broken straight out of the box. Spent 30 minutes trying to get it fixed before I gave up. Still using my old tackle box. FYI, this company has no phone number for customer service. Quite annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. We saw it at a store and it was almost $100 more expensive. We went night fishing and the LED light was great. So many compartments and fits a lot lures. A+
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity, very convenient and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to haul all my gear as well as my two kids. Love not having to carry a tackle box in hand. Seems well made so far and fits a TON of gear.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Convenient to carry on back. Comfortable to carry. But very large and doesn't hold as much stuff as you'd think. A lot of small squirrelly spaces, only one common area of modest size. Materials are not cheap but they are also not sturdy feeling. Should cost a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Freeman

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it.....
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, had it since 2013, light stopped working within months, but not a big deal to me. After years of being used a lot, all year around, including ice fishing. The zippers are starting to break.... but thinking back on all the use and abuse, I'm surprised they've lasted as long as they have. I'll be ordering a new one in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it. It also comes with trays for baits ...
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has so many pockets. Absolutely love it. It also comes with trays for baits and lures. I was able to fill al my fishing stuff into it. It also has embedded cover for when it rains. Made from very high quality material. Very durable. cons: beware - it's BIG and that's why is not as light as you'd expect.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Bahdanau

customer_reviews.title: Score!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves this. Well made. Stores all of his fishing swag. He’s happy...I’m happy.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony McGill

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally well designed/constructed tackle bag
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of tackle bags over the years ranging from cheap to fairly pricey. This bag is without a doubt the best constructed bag I've purchased. The stitching is strong and nicely sewn. The bag's fabric is strong/heavy and I expect it will wear very well over the years. Did I mention pockets and compartments? They're everywhere. The zippers are strong with nice pull tabs. The light is a very welcome feature. I looked the bag over very carefully for any manufacturing defects- none! This will be my go-to bag for offshore and surf fishing. Well done Wild River!
customer_reviews.author: Pezgallo

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift. He loved it so much he took it to every Christmas gathering to show it off. The only thing he wished it had was somewhere to hook/carry a rod and reel. Other than that, it had everything you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a father day gift from the wife and i must say i love it. Its made from good material not cheap! Good stitching very well maid and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably still worth like $120 or so
customer_reviews.text: Quality. Attention to detail. I was surprised. Worth the money by far for me, but I got it on a crazy sale @ $85 plus tax. Probably still worth like $120 or so.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!  Awesome fishing backpack
customer_reviews.text: This by far the best fishing investment I’ve made! I have a neighborhood lake that I fish that’s 100yrds from my house and I pack all my stuff in this back pack and still have room up top for beer haha. Very durable and tons of storage!
customer_reviews.author: Juston

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully designed
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products purchased this season. Very cool and durable. Just what I wanted and needed to get to some tough to reach fishing spots!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fishing pack
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I don’t like about this back pack it’s one of the most important fishing items I own
customer_reviews.author: Tom Dehnert

customer_reviews.title: I wanted this back pack 2 years ago, but ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this back pack 2 years ago, but this year I finally get it, this is a very well tough backpack, holds lots of stuff, all my soft swimbait, jigs, GPS etc, and it still have more room. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Nhan Hong

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This fishing backpack worked perfectly for my son, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fishing backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great fishing backpack very good quality. Stores everything I need. I wish I bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Any fisherman would want this.
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect and I love it. It holds ALL of your fishing supplies and accessories. The light is an amazing added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Sellas

customer_reviews.title: Best Tackle Pack I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tackle box I have ever owned. More than enough space for all my lures, soft bates, and everything else I need for a day of fishing lakeside or on the river.
customer_reviews.author: JJPhotoWriter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fishing bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag is awesome and carries everything that you would need for a short day of fishing or an extended period. Light is very bright and useful in low light conditions. Water proof cover helps in wet weather or rough boat rides. Would highly recommend for the avid or beginner fisherman or woman.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle  Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle bag, a little pricey. Seems to be made to last, perfect bag for the boat. I have used it 4 times, I luv it so far, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Onerah

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this bag! Downfall, within a few uses one of the zippers broke. Aside from that it has so much storage.
customer_reviews.author: K.Price

customer_reviews.title: no waterproof cover in the box
customer_reviews.text: beware! This did not include the waterproof cover!Check for all the pieces and parts and you’d have to return the entire item and I hope that you would get a cover with the next one! Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: nailsonu

customer_reviews.title: Great setup!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really awesome tackle bag. It's pretty reasonably priced based on what I found whilst searching the interwebs. The light feature is as cool as it sounds. It's a huge help when going out for a night bite. This thing can hold a ton of gear. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffy Platinum

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth about $50
customer_reviews.text: The zippers aren’t what I would consider well made. There is no doubt with heavy use the zippers will fail. Only If the bag had a place to store spinner baits I’d would have given 3 stars. I will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: I love this fishing backpack.  Fits all I need, very functional and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I don't use the light. All else is great. I love the design!
customer_reviews.author: Johnsz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pack
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The plastic bins are nice and held almost all my lures. I will modify 1 bin to hold my spinnerbaits. Plenty of space otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smith

customer_reviews.title: He said it is the best tackle box you can get
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday and he loves it! He said it is the best tackle box you can get! I was very happy to hear that, considering the price is high. But, it was worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Blossom

customer_reviews.title: Great Fishing Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great Fishing Backpack. Tons of room for lures, gadgets, and thing a ma bobs. The light is nice and soooo bright lol won't have any trouble finding what you need in the dark because this light will surly pave the way.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: I received this a few days ago. I packed it tonight and am more than impressed. It comes with 4 3600 boxes, which hold quite a bit. I also purchased two 3500 boxes for extra storage. I believe this thing can fit six of the 3500s in addition to the four 3600s. I had more than enough room for what I am planning to take to this weekends boundary waters trip. I will hopefully be able to update this review after I return.
customer_reviews.author: E. Krones

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Love it got it to keep all my deep sea fishing gear in makes it nice to throw on your back and go fishing off a pier
customer_reviews.author: Steve Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Close your eyes and click "Proceed to check-out"
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to rating a product i want it 100% as it is described. This is the first product im giving 5 stars. All other gets 4. Excellent. Beautifull. All in one.
customer_reviews.author: bali shah

customer_reviews.title: This is by far, the best way I've carried my tackle.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far, the best way I've carried my tackle. Was well worth the money and I now have everything in one pack, and have lots of space, and a light - that goes inside and outside, a place for my glasses - but then, I don't normally carry them with me, lots of stuff outside.
customer_reviews.author: Traderhut Games

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Excellent Quality and very good. Will buy again when I need to.
customer_reviews.author: David Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: What a great product, so well made, loads of space, an excellent value. Wish I found this a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Hubs loved it
customer_reviews.text: He has yet to put it to use so ill circle back when he does. First glance and inspection determines that it will be a great addition to his fishing treks.
customer_reviews.author: Petalo

customer_reviews.title: Really nice! So far very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love having everything I need close at hand and easy to organize
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Holds everything you need and more. Zippers could use some lube to work just a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: John Wells

customer_reviews.title: Makes others jealous
customer_reviews.text: Husband is the talk of the town with this thing. All his buddies are jealous and are asking their wives for one. Great for the fisherman in Your life
customer_reviews.author: Nicholscl

customer_reviews.title: Be really careful about the light
customer_reviews.text: The build of the product is not bad but I don't think it'll last as long as I'd hope it would. The light on mine is a joke it already doesn't work it quit in less than a week of owning the backpack
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best tackle bag I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best tackle bag I have ever owned! Construction is of high quality, accessibility and ease of use is great. This pack definitely makes my hikes through the woods to my fishing spots a lot easier. The price might seem a little steep, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg wickersham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my husband. He is excited to get it filled up.
customer_reviews.author: Price1607

customer_reviews.title: Checked this bag full of gear for fishing!
customer_reviews.text: This pack is excellent. It is comfortable to wear and fits a ton of gear. I filled this bag up with a ton of fishing lures to fish in Canada and then used it as a checked bag to fly there from Texas. It has held up real well and I even used the rain-fly there as well. Every stitch looks solid and will last a long time with a little care.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Utility maximized
customer_reviews.text: I love it... It is very practical and useful. I recommend it to anyone interested in fishing
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad

customer_reviews.title: I just might have to buy one for myself!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because every other fishing backpack sold the trays separated but this was the best damn buy I ever made! My husband and I are frequent fishers and i was so impressed I’m debating on buying myself one!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tackle bag on the market. Pay for it, it will pay for itself in a few fishing trips. This is one well thought out tackle bag. Thank goodness someone was using their head when creating this outstanding product for anglers.
customer_reviews.author: Echo 5 Victor

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice Back Pack for fishing
customer_reviews.text: WOW, This is a nice Back Pack for fishing, I use this for fishing on my friends small fishing boat and it works JUST RIGHT. It has all the Bells and whistles for a Fishing back pack, I mean everything is right there. SO I am very pleased with this item for sure.
customer_reviews.author: ShaDexRob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome back pack!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the best things I have bought for fishing. It carries all my gear!!! Instead of having 3 tackle boxes, I have this and it works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Williamson

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. He said it is easier to climb up and down the steep river banks with a backpack on rather than carrying a bunch of gear and his pole. He also gets a lot of comments on how handy this bag is.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn G

customer_reviews.title: Backpack fishing back is great choice!! and it has many space keep your items!
customer_reviews.text: One of best item for fishing stuff. it has many space to keep things such as sunglasses, long nose , tackle box and so on. very sturdy and practical . it also has light , this help at night fishing. really good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Customer Service Team

customer_reviews.title: You Need This
customer_reviews.text: You need this the light is amazing for nights the gear is stored in just the right places the workstation makes on spot jobs amazing and frees hands up to carry a poles and other things
customer_reviews.author: shannon diaz

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent pack i love not having to cary a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pack i love not having to cary a huge tackle box in one hand anymore especially when im hiking through the woods. Ive been using this bag for over 6 months now and i don't have a single complaint yet.
customer_reviews.author: Will J

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and well made. I am still exploring how to best utilize the storage. The light is a luxury that I will likely use at some point.
customer_reviews.author: Benson Kirkman

customer_reviews.title: Literally is the best gift I ave to my father since he is ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality gear, worth every single cent for this. Literally is the best gift I ave to my father since he is a fisherman. The plastic supports on the bottom are the biggest hit since it elevates so will in mud and heightened waters. The pack also has a strong structure, it doesn't fold over on it's own weight and is made of good quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Adonis Muminovic

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Rugged construction. This backpack was a big hit with my grandson for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: countrycool

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Father's day for my husband. He loved it! One of his favorite gifts he's received? Lots of storage and a great way to stay organized? Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Quality Backpack
customer_reviews.text: The bag is really nice and well layed out. No complaints so far. I was able to use the top section for my essential soft plastics, so I am now down to one bag for my tackle. It’s nice to have your hands free when hauling your gear around.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Chancy

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle backpack!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this case! We ordered the wt3503 and returned it! The cases were so small he couldn't fit most of his crank baits in it! This one holds everything he needs and has room for drinks or snacks In the top. We are very happy with the bigger case!
customer_reviews.author: M. Young

customer_reviews.title: The awesomeness of this
customer_reviews.text: Really great. I thought it maybe was to expensive but after using it I bought a second one for my kid I like it so much
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this backpack! He is able to fit everything into it including a fold up fishing pole. He grabs this and takes our grandson fishing. Everything is in 1 place.
customer_reviews.author: Lori K.

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband, who is new to fishing. He loves it and it holds all his stuff, with room to grow. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Perraglia

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect! Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for my jewelry making stuff when I am out at craft and trade shows. It's perfect! Very high quality, well made. Wish it came in other colors. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Tons of room for carrying more than enough tackle for an all day fishing trip. Only complaint was the retractable leash for the clippers arrived broken. Comfortable to carry around especially on those longer trips.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle box as a backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack has a lot of space for your tackle. Love the notion of this being a backpack. Its a lot easier to carry tackle to go fishing. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NUMBER 1
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fishing bag on the market. Extremely durable, I wish I had 5. Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: MICKEY W.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! I wish it was offered in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! I wish it was offered in the larger size but awesome none the less. I just ordered another one for my freshwater set-up. Wild River.... It comes with WAY too may tags though.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Feldhouse

product_meta.title: Wild River by CLC WT3604 Tackle Tek Nomad Lighted Backpack & Four PT3600 Trays
product_meta.description:
The Nomad is Wild River's soft tackle "single solution" bag. It has an integrated LED light system that allows you to see into the bag or your work area when natural light gets scarce. It also features a large upper storage area with a removable divider which can convert this bag to a full-size backpack for holding larger items. The Nomad has the capacity to hold up to six 3600-series and four 3500-series trays.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Wild River, an outdoor adventure gear brand developed by CLC. CLC has been the industry standard for over 30 years through an unrivaled dedication to innovation, craftmanship, and quality. Wild River is committed to designing a series of innovative products that will provide consumers with that "next-level" outdoor experience.
feature_bullets: FISH AT ALL HOURS: This lighted fishing tackle backpack features an integrated LED light system so you can fish any time of day.
PROTECT YOUR GLASSES: This fishing tackle backpack has a mounted molded sunglass holder to help keep your glasses safe.
REMOVABLE PLIER HOLDER: This fishing tackle backpack has a removable plier holder so your pliers go from bag to belt and are easy to find.
PROTECTION FROM THE ELEMENTS: This fishing backpack features a protective rain cover that can be quickly deployed to keep your tackle backpack contents safe.
CONVENIENT WORK SURFACE: The front pocket cover on this fishing tackle backpack folds down to provide a handy work surface.
Integrated LED light system allows for fishing from dusk to dawn
Lower tray compartment for storage of up to 4 medium #3600-style trays
Protective rain cover can be quickly deployed to keep your bag contents safe
Permanently mounted molded sunglass holder helps keep your glasses safe
Removable plier holder goes from bag to belt so your pliers are easy to find
Front pocket cover folds down to provide a handy work surface

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
